title: £270.00 pw-1 bed in Finsbury Park Road, Finsbury Park, Ref: 274
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Finsbury Park Road, Finsbury Park, N4
£270.00 Per Week
Ref: 274

Property Details
We are happy to offer this amazing 1 bed apartment situated in a well maintained Victorian building, Finsbury Park Road, Finsbury Park, N4.

The property consists of:
* Newly refurbished 1 bed apartment
* The property is set on the first floor and comprises a large bedroom, an open plan kitchen, bedroom and shower room.
* Finsbury Park Road is ideally located moments from local shops and amenities on Blackstock Road and Seven Sisters and Islington’s fashionable Upper Street is also close by offering a fantastic range of shops, bars and restaurants.
* The closest station is Finsbury Park (Piccadilly, Victoria lines and National Rail)
* Gas bills included
